title: ATen: How to get cusparseHandle_t handle?
body_html:
I'm trying to call function from <cusparse.h> inside ATen and don't know how to get cusparseHandle_t handle. Could you help me?

I see a relevant function in THCS, but it depends on THCState *state, and I don't know how to get it too.
body_text:
I'm trying to call function from <cusparse.h> inside ATen and don't know how to get cusparseHandle_t handle. Could you help me?
I see a relevant function in THCS, but it depends on THCState *state, and I don't know how to get it too.
body:
I'm trying to call function from <cusparse.h> inside ATen and don't know how to get cusparseHandle_t handle. Could you help me?

I see a relevant function in THCS, but it depends on THCState *state, and I don't know how to get it too.
